subject: College Athletics
Basketball
Basketball (College)
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: After a 5-26 record two seasons ago, Wagner is now 8-3 under coach Dan Hurley, including an impressive victory over then-No. 15 Pittsburgh.
snippet: After a 5-26 record two seasons ago, Wagner is now 8-3 under coach Dan Hurley, including an impressive victory over then-No. 15 Pittsburgh.
